Package com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.components.routing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcatStreams
    Component to ConcatStreams two or more streams of packets
    Copy
    Component to copy all incoming packets - mostly used for debugging purposes.
    Crash  
    Discard
    Component to discard all incoming packets - mostly used for debugging purposes.
    Gate
    Component copies incoming packets - delayed until trigger received
    Heartbeat
    Component to generate packets every 'n' milliseconds, where 'n' is specified in an InitializationConnection.
    Inject
    Component to inject an IIP String as an IP
    Kick
    Component to generate a single packet containing blank string - mostly used for debugging.
    KickWD
    Component to kick-start processing, emitting an IP with specified data
    LoadBalance
    Component to assign incoming packets to the output port that has the smallest backlog of packets waiting to be processed.
    Output
    This component displays the content of incoming IPs; open and close brackets are shown with their level numbers - the first open bracket is shown as OPEN(1)
    Passthru
    Pass a stream of packets to an output stream.
    RandomDelay
    Component to pass packets through with random delay (0 - 2 secs.).
    RRMerge
    "Round Robin" Merge
    SelNthItem
    Component to select a specific item from a stream, by number - contributed by Bob Corrick, November 2011
    Sort
    Sort a stream of up to 999999 Packets to an output stream
    Splitter1
    Component to split an input stream into multiple output streams, where the first 30 packets go to the first output port, the next 30 go to the second and so on.
    SubstreamSensitiveMerge
    First-come, first-served - sensitive to substreams
